title: Grocery Store Quilts
description:
There's more on the docket that needs to be cleared! Tucking in blankets whilst bedmaking, ice cream sandwich bread, Game of Thrones series finale thoughts, bagel consumption, and more! Plus toddler questions in a new segment and a farewell to Leafy, the leaf blower outside Jesse's house.

Links discussed in the episode: 

  • Don’t Tell Ken Burns Quilts Are Quaint -- The New York Times
  • Cable Car Bell Ringing Competition in San Francisco
  • Video of Cable Car Bell Ringing contestants
  • The Fandom Wiki Page for Spirit Halloween's Harvester of Souls
author: shows@maximumfun.org (John Hodgman, Jesse Thorn)
